name: Teddy's Dream
description:
Game prototype mad during the KrakJam 2020 - local edition of a GGJ.

Every one of us has a memory of our favourite toys from childhood. Probably some fro us even can remember stories and adventures which we that we lived through with them. But do you know whats happened when we fall asleep? Our teddy bears, dolls or plastic soldiers stand against his old, crapy brothers. They are bringing alive by an evil teddy bear necromancer with the power of forgotten memories and abandoned love. This abominated creature want to steal children's dream to uphold they miserable existence. But not on our watch!

Twist idea of "Toy Story" with mechanics from Plants vs Zombie.
